articles.title: Revolutionizing Laundry: From Traditional Washing Machines to AI-Enhanced Efficiency with T-Rand's Smart Innovations
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Samsung's AI washing machines detect fabric types and adjust detergent dispensing. LG Electronics is innovating with 'AI DD' technology, identifying fabric types and adjusting drum movements. Unilever's Wonder Wash uses AI and robotics to deliver a powerful clean preventing residue build-up.

articles.title: NZ Startup Sees Large Growth in Rural Trade Businesses
articles.summary: G-P (Globalization Partners) has been recognized as an EOR industry leader in NelsonHall's 2025 Global EOR Services NEAT evaluation report. G-P's global employment platform includes the Global HR Agent, G-P Gia™, and AI-powered Employer of Record (EOR) and Contractor products and delivers comprehensive, AI-powered global employment solutions.

articles.title: No Prime Needed!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia has introduced the GeForce RTX 5070 graphics card at a price below its $550 MSRP, signaling increased accessibility in the GPU market. This move is driven by competition from AMD and Intel, and aims to maintain market share and attract a wider audience by addressing affordability. The RTX 5070's availability at a lower price point is expected to benefit gamers, AI developers, content creators and researchers.

articles.title: Smart Kitchen 101
articles.author: Jeff Wise
articles.summary: The company (implied by the mention of SmartThings app) is offering smart kitchen appliances like refrigerators with features like AI Vision Inside which tracks food inventory, recipe generation based on available ingredients and user preferences, and integration with the SmartThings app for grocery list management. These features aim to enhance the cooking experience and make kitchen tasks more convenient.

articles.title: This laundry-folding robot startup swears it's for real
articles.author: Jared Newman
articles.summary: Syncere, a startup, received over 1,000 preorders for its Lume robot, which is designed to fold laundry. The company is taking preorders for $200.

articles.title: 18 Unsexy Beauty Products That Seriously Work, According To Editors
articles.summary: The article showcases several beauty and personal care products favored by Scary Mommy editors. It highlights the benefits and features of products such as Nizoral Anti-Dandruff Shampoo, Eucerin Eczema Relief Cream Body Wash, Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser, Revlon Liquid Lipstick, ARM & HAMMER Advance White Toothpaste, Ella & Eden Organic Castor Oil, Seche Vive Instant Gel Effect Top Coat Nail Polish, Frownies Forehead and Between the Eyes Facial Patches, and Aquaphor, emphasizing their effectiveness and value.

articles.title: Wyze's new palm-scanning door lock has a second, backup battery
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Wyze has announced and is launching the Wyze Palm Lock, its first smart door lock. This door lock can be opened by hovering an open hand over it, utilizing an infrared sensor to identify users through the veins in their hands.

articles.title: From wet market to thriving e-shop: ‘We were happy selling 200kg of fish a day, but now we can do even more'
articles.summary: Sin Chwee Mini Market transformed into Tankfully Fresh, launching an e-commerce platform for fresh and frozen fish with Enterprise Singapore's support. They developed "Sell N Chill," an omnichannel inventory management system, and are planning to launch Crispy Salted Fish Flakes, with a focus on future commercialization.

articles.title: Cornbread Fans Give This New Ready-to-Bake Batter 5 Stars—Here's Why
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Krusteaz has launched a new Honey Cornbread Batter, priced at $6.99 and available at retailers like Walmart. This refrigerated batter contains no artificial preservatives and can be used to bake eight muffins or one 8x8 pan. The Krusteaz company is excited to provide its Makers the freedom to do it all.

articles.title: Meet The $17 Body Wash People Say Makes An ‘Immediate Difference' For Crepey Skin
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Naturium introduces Glow Getter, an oil-based body wash with glycerin and squalane, designed to hydrate and smooth skin. The company also offers Smoother, a glycolic acid body wash with lactic, pyruvic, and tartaric acids and red algae for exfoliation and reducing skin roughness. User reviews highlight the products' effectiveness in improving skin texture and appearance.

articles.title: Andrew Yang launches wireless war to slash your phone bill
articles.summary: Noble, a new mobile service, aims to reduce Americans' phone bills by paying users back for unused data. Plans start at $50, and customers can earn 5.5% interest on unused funds. The service positions itself as consumer-friendly by not draining customers' wallets.

articles.title: With Noble Mobile, Andrew Yang wants to do for data What Mark Cuban did for prescription drugs
articles.author: Will Zimmerman
articles.summary: Andrew Yang has launched Noble Mobile, a wireless carrier offering unlimited data for $50 a month. Users who consume less than 20 gigabytes of data can earn up to $20 back each month. Trump Mobile also launched in June 2025.

articles.title: The New Advertising Formula to Experiment With? Meshing Creativity With Context
articles.author: Jean-Paul Colaco
articles.summary: T-Mobile Advertising Solutions is offering a new approach to advertising that leverages mobile signals and AI. This approach focuses on predicting consumer intent and delivering relevant advertising in real-time, aiming to improve campaign effectiveness and respect consumer privacy by connecting media ecosystems and utilizing AI for proactive campaign management.

articles.title: Aronka's Five Star Creation Brings Sweet Innovation to the Ice Cream Industry
articles.author: Hamida Botchway
articles.summary: Aronka's Five Star Creation, a new ice cream manufacturing business, is debuting with a focus on blending tradition and creativity. The company is committed to quality and innovation by using locally sourced ingredients and designing inventive flavors. Aronka's Five Star Creation aims to set a new standard in frozen desserts.

articles.title: What happened to the Swedish meatballs? IKEA to add NJ-made falafel balls next year
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: IKEA is introducing a new product, the falafel ball, to celebrate the 40th anniversary of its meatball offering. The falafel ball, made with chickpeas, zucchini, onions, and spices, will be available in IKEA U.S. restaurants in early 2026, plated with couscous, aioli, and a slice of lemon.

articles.title: Google Introduces Windows Spotlight Search Bar, Enhancing PC Search and Productivity Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has launched its integrated 'Windows Spotlight Search Bar' directly within the Windows 11 taskbar. The new feature offers direct Google Search integration, app and file search, dynamic backgrounds, personalized results, and voice search compatibility. This aims to streamline the search process and enhance the user experience.

articles.title: Wyze's new palm-scanning door lock has a second, backup battery
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Wyze is launching the Wyze Palm Lock, a smart door lock that opens via palm scanning, for $129.98. The lock also supports physical keys, code entry, and Wyze's mobile app, and features up to six months of battery life with millimeter wave radar. Wyze's Palm Lock is Wi-Fi connected and compatible with smart assistants like Amazon's Alexa or Google Assistant.

articles.title: 6 Windows features that disappeared (and what they were replaced with)
articles.author: Oluwademilade Afolabi
articles.summary: Microsoft has replaced Internet Explorer with the faster and more secure Microsoft Edge, built on Chromium.  Cortana, the voice assistant, has been replaced by Copilot, an AI assistant integrated into Windows 11 and Microsoft 365, focusing on typed commands and context-aware tasks. Microsoft also introduced the new Media Player in Windows 11 as a replacement for Windows Media Player, offering a cleaner design and broader file support.

articles.title: Snapdragon X1: 32GB RAM & OLED Display
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched the Yoga Slim 7x, a new ultrabook powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite processor. It features an OLED display, AI capabilities through Lenovo's Ai Core and Microsoft's Copilot+, and promises over 15 hours of battery life. The Yoga Slim 7x is positioned as a competitor to the MacBook Air M4 and LG Gram models.

articles.title: Evoto Brings AI Culling and Cloud Spaces to Desktop, Unveils Mobile App and Powerful Video Retouching Tool
articles.author: Evoto AI
articles.summary: Evoto AI hosted its first brand event, Evoto One, where it launched a range of new AI-powered products and features for photographers and videographers. These products include mobile and video solutions designed to streamline workflows on a single platform and appeal to a broader audience.

articles.title: Andrew Yang took inspiration from Mark Cuban for his budget cell carrier Noble Mobile
articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.summary: Andrew Yang launched Noble Mobile, a new mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) that uses T-Mobile's network and offers a $50 monthly plan with unlimited talk, text, and 5G data. Noble Mobile provides 'Noble Cash' back to users who use less than 20 GB of data per month, which can be redeemed for rewards or cashed out.

articles.title: Laundry Detergent Market to Reach US$ 125.91 Billion by 2033
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble and Unilever are innovating in the liquid laundry detergent market, focusing on new enzyme formulations and sustainable practices. Unilever aims to incorporate 25% post-consumer recycled plastic in packaging, while P&G targets 100% recyclable or reusable packaging by 2030. The companies are also developing plant-based surfactants with high biodegradability for eco-friendly formulations.

articles.title: Show HN: Archil's one-click infinite, S3-backed local disks now available
articles.summary: Archil has launched a new high-performance storage protocol, designed to deliver local-like performance to cloud instances. The new protocol is available for free trial via the provided link.

articles.title: You'll Have That Revolutionizes E-commerce with Community-First Approach and Exceptional Customer Service Standards
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: You'll Have That launches an innovative retail platform. The platform combines quality electronics and accessories.

articles.title: Is Your House Wyze Enough to Read Your Palms? This Door Lock Is.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Wyze is launching the Palm Lock, a $130 smart lock that uses palm vein recognition for secure, keyless entry. The device stores palm scans locally for enhanced security and is designed to be faster and more reliable than fingerprint-reading sensors.

articles.title: The M&S 'flattering' and 'cosy' dress which is perfect for autumn
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has unveiled its new 'Jersey Cosy Midi Column Dress' priced at £36 as part of its seasonal collection. The dress is available in multiple colors and sizes and designed with comfort and style in mind. New Look and Nobody's Child offer similar dresses, highlighting options for shoppers heading into autumn.

articles.title: Luxury sleep, without the luxury price: Origin Mattress arrives in the U.S.
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Origin Mattress is launching two new mattress products in the U.S.: the Origin Adapt Hybrid Mattress and the Origin LumbarCloud Mattress. The Adapt Hybrid combines memory foam with pocketed coils and HexaGrid technology for support and cooling, while the LumbarCloud offers a zero-gravity sensation with Antigravity Gel Technology for back and joint pain relief. The U.S. launch includes a discount of up to 40% off mattresses, plus two free pillows.

articles.title: DataOps.live Launches Major Upgrade to Deliver AI-Ready Data at Enterprise Scale
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DataOps.live launched the DataOps Automation Platform, uniting CI/CD, observability, governance, and data product delivery to operationalize trusted AI. The platform addresses the need for AI-ready data highlighted as a top investment priority among data management leaders.

articles.title: Vital dehumidifier that tackles damp and helps cut bills gets major discount
articles.author: Jonny Yates
articles.summary: A compact humidifier with a 1.3L water tank achieves a dehumidification capacity of up to 400-500ml per day. It helps reduce problems such as mould, fog, and odour and creates a healthier living space, all while drying clothes. Customers highlight its quiet operation, effectiveness in pulling moisture, and useful features such as an auto shut-off.

articles.title: My Choice Bathroom Announces Strategic Move to Revolutionize Bathroom  Remodeling
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: My Choice Bathroom has partnered with ClientSwing to integrate AI technology into its bathroom remodeling services. This collaboration aims to enhance online visibility, expedite client response times, provide personalized design recommendations, and offer real-time project updates, streamlining operations and improving overall customer experience.

articles.title: Brewed to Perfection: Nespresso Now at Your Doorstep with Mr D Premium Coffee, Instant Convenience at In-Store Pricing
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Mr D has partnered with Nespresso to launch Nespresso products on the Mr D app, offering South Africans seamless access to premium at-home coffee solutions. Customers can now order Nespresso's original coffee pod range, with the Vertuo range launching soon, along with machines and accessories via the Mr D app.

articles.title: Sobot Encourages the Synergy of Generative AI & Multi-Faceted AI in Customer Contact
articles.author: Sobot
articles.summary: Sobot, an AI customer contact solution provider, has released testing results for its updated Sobot AI. The AI achieved a 90% average response accuracy rate and an 88% independent resolution rate based on testing with over 100 customers.

articles.title: Miva Adds Merchandising to Vexture: AI-Powered Product Recommendations That Help Merchants Stay Ahead of the Competition
articles.author: Miva
articles.summary: Miva, Inc. has launched Vexture℠ AI, a product search, discovery, and merchandising tool. The new tool features dynamic merchandising using natural language prompts and contextual AI intelligence, enabling more personalized product recommendations for businesses. This aims to eliminate manual merchandising and directly drive sales.

articles.title: Sobot Encourages the Synergy of Generative AI & Multi-Faceted AI in Customer Contact
articles.summary: Sobot, an AI customer contact solution provider, has released updated Sobot AI, which leverages the synergy of Generative AI and Multi-faceted AI. The updated Sobot AI boasts an average response accuracy rate of over 90% and an independent resolution rate of 88% after testing with over 100 customers. It includes features like Intelligent Chunking, Precise Retrieval, Enhanced Generation using multiple LLMs, and Small Language Models (SLMs) for targeted services.

articles.title: Huawei Launches Global Release of Device Before China Launches Its Own Version
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Nova 12 series in global markets before its official debut in China. The Nova 12 series boasts features like an advanced camera system, stylish design, fast charging capabilities, and HarmonyOS integration. This global-first approach allows Huawei to expand its footprint in key international markets and gather valuable user feedback.

articles.title: Boost your device with reliable SSD storage for speed and performance:Top picks for smooth multitasking and secure check
articles.summary: Crucial launched the BX500 500GB internal SSD, offering faster boot times and reliable performance. Kingston introduced the XS1000 2TB portable SSD, featuring fast file transfers and dual USB support. Transcend released the 310C 512GB portable SSD with versatile connectivity, while Samsung launched the T7 Shield 1TB portable SSD, emphasizing rugged protection and fast speeds. SanDisk offers Extreme Portable SSD with reliable performance in a compact design and Amazon Basics launched 1TB SSD providing speed and affordability.

articles.title: Western Window Systems Launches Series 8900 Hinged Door
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Western Window Systems has launched the Series 8900 Hinged Door, an addition to their Vantage Line. This new door is designed for modern residential and commercial architecture, offering clean lines, smooth operation, and superior thermal performance.

articles.title: Google Ads rolls out AI Max & new generative tools globally
articles.author: IT Brief Australia
articles.summary: In May 2025, Google introduced AI Max into its search campaigns in select geographical regions. This one-click tool includes final URL expansion, search term matching, and improved text customisation for Search campaigns. AI Max also redirects users to relevant landing pages through URL expansion.

articles.title: Best men's advent calendars for 2025 from grooming to socks, tried and tested
articles.author: Samuel Mathewson
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new advent calendars for 2025. Liberty offers a men's advent calendar featuring niche brands and premium fragrances. Lookfantastic's grooming advent calendar mixes affordable and premium brands. Penhaligon's presents a heritage-inspired calendar with fragrances, candles, and body care. Acqua di Parma offers a luxury fragrance calendar. Sockshop provides a calendar filled with bamboo socks. Molton Brown introduces a shareable calendar with body washes, lotions, and fragrances.

articles.title: The 2025 Limited Edition Modern Essentials Box is The Gear Upgrade You Didn't Know You Needed (Until Now)
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: GQ is launching the "2025 Limited Edition Modern Essentials Box", a curated collection of gear and grooming products tested and vetted by GQ editors. Subscribers can purchase the box for $99 (valued at $346), while non-subscribers can get it for $179. Quantities are limited.

articles.title: Shopware celebrates 25th anniversary with merchants at Shoptoberfest and Shopware Community Day 2025
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Shopware will host events to highlight product innovation and the future of e-commerce. The events will feature Shopware's global community of merchants and partners. These events are related to product launching and services.

articles.title: Lenovo Hong Kong and Cyberport Form Strategic Partnership; Empowering Hong Kong Startups to Go Global
articles.author: Lenovo
articles.summary: Lenovo Hong Kong partners with Cyberport to bolster startup development in Hong Kong, offering comprehensive support from proof-of-concept to global expansion. Lenovo will showcase innovative cultural tourism technology at Cyberport's immersive Gallery and establish an Innovation Center at Cyberport to demonstrate its latest digital solutions. The collaboration includes financial backing, technological resources, and access to Lenovo's global network.

articles.title: Lidl's kitchen appliance with one sold every 24 seconds back in stores this autumn
articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.summary: Silvercrest's Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a kitchen appliance, is being relaunched in Lidl stores. It is priced at €499.99 and includes features such as guided cooking with video instructions, app connectivity, voice control, and a self-cleaning mode. The appliance will also be available through Lidl's new Click, Reserve & Collect service.

articles.title: Arla and Mars pilot scheme to boost AI brand visibility
articles.author: George Nott
articles.summary: Arla and Mars are piloting Azoma's platform to optimize their brand visibility on AI search engines. Smaller brands like PerfectTed and David Protein are also working with Azoma on a similar service to boost their visibility among consumers searching for related products on ChatGPT and Perplexity.  Azoma's platform helps companies create content optimized for large language models and track their share of voice in AI.

articles.title: Here Are All the New iPhone Ringtones in iOS 26
articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.summary: iOS 26 introduces new ringtone variants for the iconic 'Reflection' ringtone, which was originally introduced with the iPhone X in 2017. The new variants include Buoyant, Dreamer, Pond, Pop, Reflected, and Surge, offering different sonic energies.

articles.title: ASAPP Expands GenerativeAgent Platform to Redefine the Future of Customer Experience
articles.summary: ASAPP has announced advancements to its GenerativeAgent Platform, providing enterprises with capabilities to build and govern AI agents. The new workflows offer operational leaders stronger oversight and technical builders greater flexibility. ASAPP will showcase these capabilities in a webcast on September 18, 2025.

articles.title: NextPlat Launches its Florida Sunshine Brand of Premium Vitamins in Europe and North America and Receives Initial Approval for Sale in China
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NextPlat Corp (NASDAQ: NXPL, NXPLW) is planning multi-national AI-powered digital and social media marketing programs. NextPlat Corp is launching Florida Sunshine into the high-growth wellness market, aiming to reach potentially hundreds of millions of consumers globally, including in China.

articles.title: Aurzen Zip by Yang Cui Wins Platinum in A' Electronics Industry Awards
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: The Aurzen Zip, a portable projector, has won the Platinum A' Design Award in the Digital and Electronic Device Design category. The Aurzen Zip features a tri-fold design, enabling flexible projection angles, an integrated battery, and an ultra-compact form factor. Aurzen is dedicated to making products immersive, versatile, and effective at bringing people together.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy F17 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy F17 on September 11, 2025, and released it on September 14, 2025. The 5G-ready smartphone features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, an Exynos 1330 processor, up to 6GB of RAM, a 50MP main camera, and a 5000 mAh battery with 25W wired charging.

articles.title: 36 Fall Cleaning Products For The Unmotivated
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of cleaning products including Mr. Clean Spiced Harvest all-purpose cleaner for festive cleaning, Bioclean hard water stain remover, Leather Honey leather conditioner for furniture restoration, Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Multi-Surface Cleaner Set and Therapy Clean plant-based wood polish. These products aim to simplify cleaning tasks and provide effective solutions for different household needs, enhancing the cleaning experience.

articles.title: New ‘Wyze Palm Lock' uses biometric scan for contactless entry in latest smart home device
articles.author: Kurt Schlosser
articles.summary: Wyze has launched the Wyze Palm Lock, a smart home door lock that uses palm vein biometrics for contactless entry. The lock, priced at $129.98, includes features like auto-locking, anti-peep technology, tamper and ajar alarms, and a dual battery system.

articles.title: Cordial Foundry moves agents from draft mode to delivery with SAM and Figma integration
articles.author: Cordial
articles.summary: Cordial expanded its Foundry innovation program by introducing new AI-powered tools. These tools enable AI to select assets, apply brand rules, and ship campaigns end-to-end for enterprise marketing teams.

articles.title: SpeedyIndex Launches Drip-Feed Feature to Combat "Indexing Crisis" as Research Shows 40% of Web Content Remains Invisible to Google
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SpeedyIndex has launched its new Drip-Feed indexing feature, which allows users to submit URLs for indexing gradually. This new safety-focused feature complements SpeedyIndex's core high-speed indexing service and is designed for new websites, large-scale SEO campaigns, and e-commerce stores.

articles.title: How to get Indeedee in Pok�mon Go
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Indeedee has been introduced into the Pokémon Go game. A shiny version of Indeedee is also available.

articles.title: Jubna launches full-spectrum Marketplace, pivoting beyond native ads to empower brands and media owners
articles.summary: Jubna has launched Marketplace, a platform for brands and media owners. This platform allows advertisers to run promotions across various channels and allows media owners to monetize touchpoints. Within 24 hours of the launch, more than 100 new services were added to the Marketplace.

articles.title: Taylor Swift fans urged to visit Asda for new 'stylish' home decor from £8
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Asda has launched a new bedroom collection inspired by Taylor Swift. The collection, available online and in stores, includes items such as fleece blankets, bath towels, cushions, and duvet sets with prices starting from £8.50. The products feature images of Taylor Swift and are targeted towards fans of the popstar.

articles.title: Morrisons announces huge boost for customers - 'biggest range reset in decade'
articles.author: Emily Malia
articles.summary: Morrisons is launching a new "ultra premium tier" product line called 'The Best Signature Collection', featuring 500 new products, primarily focusing on fresh and festive foods. A key element is the relaunch of the partnership with Harry Ramsden's, introducing a fish and chips meal deal available exclusively at Morrisons. The product range includes various fish and side dish options.

articles.title: Get an iPhone 17 Pro free with trade-in at Verizon right now - how the ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Apple's iPhone 17 is now available for preorder. Verizon is offering both new and existing customers up to $1,100 off the new iPhones, along with free Apple Watch and iPad deals.

articles.title: Wearable Devices Ltd. (NASDAQ: WLDS) Positioned at Forefront of Wearable Sector Transformation
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Wearable Devices Ltd. has introduced the Mudra Band, a smart band for the Apple Watch, and the Mudra Link, a platform for gesture-based input. These AI-powered products utilize neural input technology for touch-free control of digital devices, aiming to enhance user experiences across various applications like gaming, productivity, and extended reality.

articles.title: DemandScience Launches Ionic and Labs to End B2B Marketing's 'Data Mirage'
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: DemandScience launched Ionic and Labs, two new offerings designed to address the 'Marketing Data Mirage'. These offerings provide verified buyer intelligence, streamlined orchestration, and expert support through DemandScience's Central platform, to help B2B marketers build predictable pipeline and growth.

articles.title: Launch Drive: Toyota Hilux Legend 55 is a fitting swansong to the current generation
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Toyota launched the Hilux Legend 55, a special edition bakkie available in Xtra Cab and Double Cab formats with prices ranging from R728,300 to R935,900. The Legend 55 features a black exterior package, unique wheels, lockable roller shutter, rubberised load box, branded styling bar, detachable tow bar and sports seats with 'Legend 55' branding and is intended to replace the regular Legend variants until 2026.

articles.title: Boursin unveils Blue Cheese Flavour SKU
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Boursin has launched a new product, Boursin Blue Cheese Flavour, designed as an accessible introduction to blue cheese. Consumer research informed the product's creamy texture and distinct blue cheese flavor. The product is launching first in Sainsbury's, followed by Morrisons and Waitrose.

articles.title: NextPlat Launches its Florida Sunshine Brand of Premium Vitamins in Europe and North America and Receives Initial Approval for Sale in China
articles.author: Next Plat Corp
articles.summary: NextPlat Corp has launched its Florida Sunshine brand of premium vitamins and supplements in domestic and international markets. The company aims to capture a share of the growing global vitamins and nutraceuticals market with this new product line. This launch positions NextPlat to meet the rising consumer demand for preventive health and convenient wellness solutions.

articles.title: Shinebed Showcases Strategic Growth and Brand Evolution at Market Week 2025
articles.author: Bedsure
articles.summary: Shinebed brands showcase recent product announcements and market-driven solutions. These announcements also involve new retail partnership opportunities for the company.

articles.title: Howard Johnson celebrates 100 years with special edition soap (photos)
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Howard Johnson by Wyndham is launching limited-edition soaps shaped like fried clam strips to commemorate its 100th anniversary. These soaps are available at select US hotels through September 2025 and online starting October 3, with limited quantities available for purchase on Hojo.com.

articles.title: Verizon angers customers with new tactic to boost loyalty
articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.summary: Verizon introduced AI-powered customer service to personalize customer support and resolve issues efficiently through Google Cloud's AI, updating customers via the My Verizon app, text messages, or callbacks. The service aims to provide greater transparency, control and 24/7 support. However, some customers report difficulty reaching human agents, indicating issues with the new AI system.

articles.title: CJ Onstyle launches AI chatbot AiON for live commerce support
articles.author: 자유 아카데미
articles.summary: CJ ENM Co.'s commerce platform CJ Onstyle has launched AiON, an AI-based chatbot for live commerce customer service. Developed with Amazon Web Services, AiON is designed to provide quick and accurate answers to product-related inquiries across five categories. The adoption of AiON is expected to double CJ Onstyle's response rate to customer inquiries.

articles.title: Nvidia sees tepid demand for RTX6000D AI chip from Chinese tech firms: sources
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Nvidia launched RTX6000D, its newest artificial intelligence chip tailored for the Chinese market. However, the product has seen only lukewarm demand with some major tech firms opting not to place orders.

articles.title: How To Leverage Marketing And Design For A Successful Product Launch
articles.author: Esade Business
articles.summary: The article provides examples of how companies like Tesla recognized demand for electric vehicles and Apple anticipated the smartphone revolution in their product development. Dyson invested in prototyping and user testing for its bladeless fan, and Airbnb refined its platform through user feedback. The article also discusses product development strategies of companies such as Henkel, Nespresso, Sara Lee, Ryanair, Southwest Airlines, Zara. In addition, the article indicates the product development strategies adopted by Apple when it shifted its iPhone production from China to India to avoid trade tariffs.

articles.title: Nothing plans to launch ‘first AI-native devices next year'
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Nothing, a London-based consumer tech startup, has secured $200 million in funding. The company plans to develop a new generation of 'AI-native' devices using operating systems that differ significantly from current ones.

articles.title: From kitchen startup to R5 toiletries on Shoprite shelves
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Zeta Laboratories and Shoprite have partnered to launch affordable toiletries in South Africa. The launch includes a body wash and a 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner available for five rand. This initiative aims to provide South Africans with access to essential toiletries.

articles.title: Allview Launches AI-Powered Washing Machines
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Visual Fan, owner of Allview, is expanding its home appliance portfolio with the Allview Sensy washing machine range, featuring integrated artificial intelligence. In spring, Visual Fan launched a range of electric commercial vehicles.

articles.title: ActiveCampaign to Showcase the Future of Autonomous Marketing at Fall 2025 Innovation Keynote
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ActiveCampaign will highlight AI-driven marketing at its Fall 2025 Innovation Keynote on September 30. The event will showcase in-context AI and the Active Intelligence workspace, designed to embed intelligence directly into marketers' workflows. These innovations, along with next-generation AI agents, aim to provide marketers with greater autonomy and measurable impact.

articles.title: Novella Launches Potent Whole-Cell Strawberry Ingredient at SSW
articles.author: Novella
articles.summary: Novella Innovative Technology, Ltd. launched Novella Strawberry, a patent-pending, new generation of bioactives derived from whole strawberry cells. This natural complex is the first of Novella's fruit-cell nutraceutical solutions, designed for efficacy, bioavailability, and sustainability. The company will introduce Novella Strawberry at SupplySide West 2025 in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Lifisher Celebrates 20th Anniversary with Thousands of Clients at New York Times Square
articles.summary: Lifisher, a foreign trade service company, celebrated its 20th anniversary by unveiling its refreshed brand message "Go Global, Go Lifisher." The company leverages its proprietary Lifisher AI Foreign Trade Large Model to deliver full-chain intelligent marketing services. A European-style furniture brand successfully entered high-end markets in Europe and America using Lifisher's GEO omnichannel marketing promotion.

articles.title: Jason's Sourdough takes to TV in ‘multimillion-pound' media push
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Jason's Sourdough is launching a national TV advertising campaign supported by radio, outdoor, retail, press, digital and social media. This push comes after opening a new bakery and launching new products including Sourdough Creations, Everyday Seeded Protein Rolls and Proper Sourdough Crumpets. Value sales of Jason's products have more than doubled, reaching £58.3m.

articles.title: This new AI voice trainer can help you learn a new language
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Babbel introduces Babbel Speak. The new service aims to assist beginners in learning a new language.

articles.title: From Tacos to Tendies: Taco Bell Canada Drops Epic New Crispy Chicken Lineup
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Taco Bell Canada launched a new Crispy Chicken lineup nationwide on September 18, featuring Crispy Chicken Tacos, Burritos, and Tenders. The products include premium all-white meat chicken marinated, golden-breaded, and seasoned with Mexican-inspired spices, available for a limited time. Taco Bell Canada also hosted the Taco Bell Crunch-In tasting event and mukbang community gathering on September 29.

articles.title: Tencent Announces Global Rollout of Scenario-Based, AI Capabilities to Accelerate Industrial Efficiency
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Tencent Cloud launched AI Agent Development Platform 3.0 internationally, making it available via Tencent Cloud. This announcement occurred at the 2025 Global Digital Ecosystem Summit. The overseas client base of Tencent Cloud has doubled since the previous year.

articles.title: Nothing plans to launch ‘first AI-native devices next year'
articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.summary: Nothing is planning to release its first AI-native devices next year, running on a focused 'AI OS' to deliver a 'hyper-personalized experience'. The company is building the foundations for the future on this AI OS and aims to integrate an AI experience into their hardware devices.

articles.title: 48 Life-Changing Solutions For Household Problems
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new household products and cleaning solutions. Among the products introduced are a WD-40 pen, Pink Stuff cleaner, Glisten disposer cleaner, Bissell Little Green Multi-Purpose Cleaner, and Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop. These products aim to improve organization, cleanliness, and convenience in various areas of the home.

articles.title: This laundry-folding robot startup swears it's for real
articles.author: Jared Newman
articles.summary: Syncere, a startup, is preparing to launch its Lume robot next summer. The robot, which transforms from bedside lamps into robotic arms, aims to automate laundry folding. Syncere is currently taking preorders for the Lume robot.

articles.title: Why MrBeast would be making a huge mistake launching his own mobile phone service
articles.author: Jeff Beer
articles.summary: Jimmy 'MrBeast' Donaldson and his Beast Industries are planning to launch their own wireless service by 2026. The wireless service will be marketed under the MrBeast brand. The article explores the challenges and potential success factors of this celebrity-endorsed wireless service launch.

articles.title: Nike Flips the Swoosh Script
articles.author: Brittaney Kiefer
articles.summary: Nike launched the 'Why Do It?' campaign, a variation of its iconic 'Just Do It' slogan, targeting Gen Z. The campaign aims to regain cultural relevance and creative edge during the company's business transformation.

articles.title: Lazada's 9.9 Mega Brands Sale 2025 Delivers Record Growth with LazMall Driving Brand-Led Momentum Across Southeast Asia  Sep. 16, 2025 10:00
articles.summary: Lazada has launched AI Lazzie, an AI-powered personal shopping assistant. During the 9.9 Mega Sale, AI Lazzie saw a 53% increase in engagements, a 34% increase in in-depth AI conversations, and a 36% uplift in orders compared to the 6.6 sale event, demonstrating the AI's role in driving engagement and conversions.

articles.title: I Found a Way to Stock Up on Official Apple Watch Bands From Just $15 ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Apple is releasing the Apple Watch Series 11. Deals are available for both new purchasers and existing Apple Watch owners.

articles.title: Canoo reveals a new electric delivery vehicle ahead of stock exchange debut
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Canoo has unveiled a new electric delivery vehicle. The announcement precedes the company's debut on the stock exchange.

articles.title: ‘007 First Light: Legacy Edition' Is Set for Early 2026: Now Available to Preorder
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: A new James Bond game is available for pre-order on PS5, Nintendo Switch 2, and Xbox. Online pre-ordering options are now accessible for the game.

articles.title: 27 Low-Effort Products That Look High-Effort
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Revlon introduces a hot air brush that dries and styles hair simultaneously. Nyx offers a matte setting spray as a cheaper alternative to Mac and Urban Decay. Additionally, a 2-in-1 eyeliner combining liner and false eyelash glue is presented for efficient makeup application.

articles.title: For The First Time, Honda Amaze Available With Black Colour Option In India
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Honda has launched a new 'Crystal Black Pearl' color option for its Amaze compact sedan in India, available across all variants. This introduction follows growing customer demand for darker shades, making the Amaze now available in this new color alongside its existing features and specifications.

articles.title: TÜV Rheinland Issues cTUVus Certification to LG's All-in-One Clothes Dryer and Ironer, Supporting Safety and Compliance for Innovative Home Appliance  Sep. 16, 2025 09:29
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched the All-in-One Clothes Dryer and Ironer, which has received cTUVus certification from TÜV Rheinland. The product combines drying and ironing functions and complies with North American market standards for electrical safety, mechanical protection, and thermal management.

articles.title: Omoda C5 X takes drab competitors to the cleaners
articles.author: Lance Witten
articles.summary: The updated Omoda C5 X features cosmetic changes, a spacious interior, and is competitively priced starting at R429,900. It offers features like a voice-activated digital assistant and is better specced compared to other models. The Omoda C5 X is an attractive option for buyers seeking exceptional value in the small to mid-size SUV/crossover market.

articles.title: NoiseFit Rugged Pro Smartwatch With GPS And 10 Days Battery Life Launched: Price, Features
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Noise has launched its new premium smartwatch, the NoiseFit Endeavour Pro, in India. The smartwatch features a 1.5-inch AMOLED display, titanium alloy bezels, a built-in torch and speaker, and dual-band GPS. It is priced at Rs 10,999 with a limited-time discount available on the company's website and other platforms.

articles.title: Canoo Reveals Trio Of All-Electric Multi-Purpose Delivery Vehicles
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Canoo, an electric vehicle company, is announcing two new multi-purpose delivery vehicles. These vehicles are designed to carry up to 1,980 pounds and have a range of up to 250 miles.

articles.title: Why Maruti launched Victoris from Arena, not Nexa
articles.author: Arushi Rawat
articles.summary: A new product or service features an introductory pricing strategy and 21 variants. It boasts a 5-star BNVSAP safety rating and includes ADAS and digital features. The product is positioned uniquely within Arena vs Nexa, and booking trends/future expectations are being monitored.

articles.title: Honda Amaze gets new 'Crystal Black Pearl' colour option in India
articles.author: Ayush Chakraborty
articles.summary: Honda Cars India has introduced a new Crystal Black Pearl color option across all variants of the third-generation Amaze compact sedan. The new color brings a sophisticated, all-black look and is expected to resonate with younger buyers. The Amaze is powered by a 1.2-litre naturally aspirated petrol engine and offers various features, including an 8-inch touchscreen infotainment system and, in higher trims, ADAS features.

articles.title: Best Promotional SMS Provider For Business Growth
articles.summary: Promotional SMS services offer businesses a direct and effective way to connect with customers by promoting products, services, offers, or events. These services ensure high delivery rates, user-friendly dashboards, targeted campaigns, and cost-effective marketing, providing instant reach, high open rates, increased engagement, and wide audience coverage. Various industries, including retail, restaurants, education, and e-commerce, can benefit from SMS marketing to share discounts, special offers, announcements, and promotional deals.

articles.title: Google sets out $6.8 billion UK investment ahead of Trump's state visit
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Google has opened a new data centre near London. The data centre aims to support the increasing need for Google's AI-driven services including Google Cloud, Search, Maps, and Workspace.

articles.title: Youth and digital entrepreneurship: Dream or reality?
articles.author: Dativa Minja
articles.summary: Lucy Prosper launched Zawadi Point, an innovative gift business, using Instagram and WhatsApp to reach customers. Albert Kagambo utilizes social media platforms to market and sell shoes, emphasizing the flexibility and reduced overhead costs of his online business model.

articles.title: Started With Rs 5,000, Now Worth Rs 17,000 Crore: The Man Who Built An Empire With A Rs 2 Product
articles.author: Parishmita Saikia
articles.summary: In 1983, Ramachandran founded Jyothy Labs and launched Ujala Supreme Liquid Fabric Whitener. Following the success of Ujala, Jyothy Labs expanded its product range significantly, including dishwashing products, personal care items, and home care goods.

articles.title: Stretch your budget by using Milton — one product with over 100 uses
articles.author: Times LIVE
articles.summary: Milton, traditionally known for sterilising baby bottles, is being promoted for its versatility in over 100 household applications. It can be used to disinfect fridges, clean surfaces, remove mould, purify water, disinfect bins, wash produce, prolong flower life, clean toilet areas, and maintain paddling pools. Milton is available as sterilising tablets, sterilising fluid, and sterilising surface trigger spray.

articles.title: I left Bain to launch a startup solving a problem I faced every day. Consulting skills helped, but here's what I had to pick up on my own.
articles.summary: Bluente initially launched a language-learning app but later pivoted to Blu Translate, an AI-powered document translation platform, after realizing clients preferred translation services over language learning. Blu Translate is designed to translate any file while preserving the original formatting.

articles.title: The best accessories for your new iPhone
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: New iPhone 12 owners need to consider accessories, as the handsets only include a Lightning cable. The need is especially pertinent for the iPhone 12. There are new MagSafe accessories available.

articles.title: Dhanyavaad Modiji, for keeping independent journalism premium with 18% GST
articles.author: Nl Team
articles.summary: Newslaundry is offering a 25% discount on their subscription service until the end of the week. This promotion coincides with GST remaining at 18% for news subscriptions. The offer is available due to the need for subscriber support in the absence of government advertising.

articles.title: It's Official: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days Is Happening — Here's Everything We Know
articles.author: Maravi Post Reporter
articles.summary: Amazon is holding its Prime Big Deal Days from October 7-8, 2025, offering discounts up to 91% on fashion, beauty, tech, home goods, and more. Early deals are already live, featuring markdowns on products from brands like Dyson, Ninja, Michael Kors, and Samsung, as well as celebrity-endorsed items.

articles.title: Started work with Rs 5000, today his company is worth Rs 170000000000, meet Ramachandran who built an empire with a product of just Rs...
articles.summary: Jyoti Labs, founded by Ramachandran, achieved success with the launch of 'Ujala Supreme Liquid Fabric Whitener', a low-cost product. The company later expanded its product line to include various dish washes, personal care items, home care products, and insect repellents.

articles.title: FXTM Expands Trading Opportunities in Nigeria, Launches New Platform
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: FXTM has launched FXTM Edge, a new trading account designed for Nigerians to enter the financial markets easily. The FXTM Edge provides access to a range of instruments and provides trade ideation tools for enhanced trading, with tight spreads and capped leverage of up to 500:1.

articles.title: Don't buy a new iPhone. Do this instead.
articles.summary: Apple is releasing its new iPhone software, iOS 26, for free to users with iPhone 11 models and newer. The update should be available for download starting Monday. The software update ensures that the phone is safer, gets new features and may work better.

articles.title: Celebrities Big Prawn Noodle, Tanjong Pagar: S$5 prawn noodles so good that even local celebs support it
articles.author: Gillian Lim
articles.summary: Celebrities Big Prawn Noodle opened in February 2022, offering three items on its menu: Pork Ribs Big Prawn Mee (S$5/S$8) and Big Prawn Mee (S$5/S$8) in both dry and soup versions. The stall is known for its rich prawn broth and good value.

articles.title: Old Navy Has a $16 Mini Dress That's 'Cute' and 'Comfortable'
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A mini dress is offered with a 65% discount, potentially as part of an introductory or promotional campaign.

articles.title: What is Cross-Market AI?
articles.author: Satya Prakash
articles.summary: Cross-Market AI, a new platform, improves accuracy and predictions by using data from multiple sources. It offers real-time correlation identification, personalization, adaptability, and 24/7 support.  It enhances decision-making, reduces costs, improves customer experiences, and drives innovation for organizations.

articles.title: TÜV Rheinland Issues cTUVus Certification to LG's All-in-One Clothes Dryer and Ironer, Supporting Safety and Compliance for Innovative Home Appliance
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TÜV Rheinland issued cTUVus certification to LG Electronics for its innovatively designed All-in-One Clothes Dryer and Ironer, confirming compliance with North American market standards for electrical safety, mechanical protection, and thermal management. This collaboration supports LG's commitment to product quality and provides a model for integrated solutions encompassing technology development, standards compliance, and market access.

articles.title: Sporting goods retailer closing 100s of US stores
articles.author: Daniel Kline
articles.summary: Nike is launching sneaker releases exclusively on its app. This strategy cuts out the middleman, reflecting a shift in how the company distributes its products.

articles.title: ALDI partnership with DoorDash now available to customers across the country
articles.author: Sarah Keszler
articles.summary: ALDI has partnered with DoorDash to launch a new on-demand delivery service available nationwide, including fresh groceries and household essentials. This partnership allows customers to order ALDI products through the DoorDash app or website for immediate or scheduled delivery, providing convenience and accessibility.

articles.title: 新宙邦：应用于IDC数据中心不同场景的液冷产品已成熟量产_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Xinzhoubang is actively developing and innovating cooling liquid technologies, including composite cooling liquid products. They are involved in creating liquid cooling standards and have mass-produced products for IDC data centers, which are currently undergoing certifications with domestic and international manufacturers. The company is also developing new types of cooling liquids, with some undergoing testing with customers.

articles.title: I left Bain to launch a startup solving a problem I faced every day. Consulting skills helped, but here's what I had to pick up on my own.
articles.author: Lee Chong Ming
articles.summary: Bluente, an AI startup, launched Blu Translate, an AI-powered document translation platform that preserves the original formatting of the translated file. This launch followed an unsuccessful initial attempt with a language-learning app, leading to a pivot towards document translation.

articles.title: Nothing raises $200 million funding, to launch AI-native devices next year
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: A smartphone maker is preparing to launch its next Community round. This launch suggests an update or new program for community engagement.

articles.title: Nissan rolls out all-new turbocharged powertrain in the region
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Nissan launched a new 1.0-liter turbocharged engine in the Middle East. The engine provides customers spirited performance.

articles.title: Microsoft\u2019s new Xbox app for Windows 11 and handhelds puts all your PC games in one place
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Microsoft's Xbox has launched a new Xbox app for Windows and handheld devices.

articles.title: Evoto Sets Sights on Adobe With Major Updates to Desktop, Mobile, and Video Apps
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Evoto AI, a software company, announced a major expansion of its product line, introducing new desktop, mobile, and video offerings during its Evoto One brand event. The expansion includes AI-powered retouching and workflow tools.

articles.title: I've moved on from Microsoft's Xbox controllers, but this new feature is something I've wanted ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: ROG Xbox Ally is receiving a new full-screen experience feature. The feature is currently available through Microsoft's Windows Insider program.

articles.title: Dreame Technology Revolutionizes Home Cleaning with the Aqua10 Ultra Roller — the World's First AquaRoll™ ...
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dreame Technology introduced the Aqua10 Ultra Roller. Dreame Technology is a smart home appliance company.

articles.title: Visworld Unveils Revolutionary One-Stop Platform for AI-Driven Image, Art & Video Creation
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: On September 16, 2025, a new all-in-one AI-powered content creation platform officially launched. This platform empowers creators, marketers, educators, designers, and innovators to transform ideas into striking visual content effortlessly.

articles.title: Dropps Launches Odor Eraser, a Breakthrough Solution That Solves Laundry's No. 1 Pain Point
articles.author: El Campo Leader-News
articles.summary: Dropps introduced its proprietary TriCore Erase™ technology. The TriCore Erase™ technology targets and eliminates deep-set odors at their source.

articles.title: Apple's new live translation feature to be available on older AirPod models
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Apple's older AirPod Pro models will receive a new feature, eliminating the need for customers to purchase the latest AirPod Pro 3.

articles.title: Google's new AI app searches ‘anything,' including your PC
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Google is testing a new experimental search app for Windows, called 'Google app for Windows'. This app searches both the user's PC and the web, utilizing Google Lens when necessary and is currently part of the Google Labs program.

articles.title: StartupScene & Madinet Masr Present: Tank Tales
articles.summary: Entrepreneur Hany ElShenawy launched 'Melts,' a new, locally-made ice cream product after securing investment on 'Shark Tank.' The investment from sharks Hamada Farouk and Ahmed Tarek is intended to expand the product's reach to ice cream lovers across Egypt and new markets. 'Melts' is a significant new addition to Egypt's food and beverage industry.

articles.title: Dubai Startup Amaani Secures $3M to Scale Arab Beauty Brand AÏZA
articles.summary: Amaani, a Dubai-based company, launched its Arab beauty brand AÏZA in May 2025. AÏZA features products like Sukkar Rush lip treatment, Scent Storm hair mist, and Date Setter brow serum, blending Arab heritage with global innovation. Within three months of launch, the brand surpassed $2M in annualised revenue, indicating strong initial market traction.

articles.title: What Is Tin Can, And Why Might Your Little Ones Love It?
articles.author: John McKay
articles.summary: Tin Can, a startup company, has launched a new Wi-Fi-enabled phone designed for children. The phone, priced at $75, offers free calls to other Tin Can phones and a $9.99 plan for calls to any phone. A companion app allows parents to manage contacts and enable 911 emergency calling.
